for inclusion of closed-circuit facilities Which are associated with

lation (designed primarily to activate the unused reserved channels)
but did feel' it appropriate to include closed circuit which was merely
an extension of a broadcasting facility* The second amendment limited
grants to public educational institutions# thus knocking out nonprofit
community educational television organisations.
This amendment was offered by Rep. Griffin (R.-Kidh®)# who
wsi* uneasy about the wording of the definition of a community organi¬

pioneer the EOT movement and would discriminate against many who had
already made a large investment in EOT.
Rap. Haileck (R.-Ind.)# minority leader# suddenly appeared on
the scene to give his blessing to the amendment* whereupon it quickly
developed into a largely partisan situation and. the Democrats, caught
with many members off the floor* were voted down 69-68.
After the implications of his amendment were fully explained*
Griffin Is reported to be rather appalled at what he has done and is
ready to work to repair the damage.
